location.zh-cn: 洛杉矶, 加利福尼亚州, 美国

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州洛杉矶的私立研究型大学，是加州最古老的私立研究型大学，以其电影艺术学院、工程学院和庞大的校友网络“特洛伊家族”而闻名。
description.en: A private research university in Los Angeles, California, the oldest private research university in California, known for its School of Cinematic Arts, Viterbi School of Engineering, and its extensive alumni network known as the 'Trojan Family'.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学的创办人。
description.en: Founder of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学现任校长。
description.en: Current president of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州的一座城市，南加州大学所在地。
description.en: A city in California, United States, and the location of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 一种用于互联网的命名系统，诞生于南加州大学。
description.en: A naming system for the Internet, which originated at the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 美国电影导演、制片人、编剧，以创作《星球大战》系列电影闻名。南加州大学知名校友及重要捐赠者。
description.en: American film director, producer, and screenwriter, famous for creating the Star Wars franchise. A notable alumnus and major donor to the University of Southern California.

nodes.id: 南加州大学电影艺术学院

zh-cn: 南加州大学电影艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学下属的学院，被广泛认为是全美顶尖的电影学院之一。
description.en: A school within the University of Southern California, widely considered one of the top film schools in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学，与南加州大学有合作关系。
description.en: A top research university in Shanghai, China, which has a partnership with the University of Southern California.

nodes.id: 上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院

zh-cn: 上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院

description.zh-cn: 由南加州大学与上海交通大学合作成立的学院。
description.en: An institute jointly established by the University of Southern California and Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

nodes.id: 洛杉矶加利福尼亚大学

zh-cn: 洛杉矶加利福尼亚大学

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州洛杉矶的公立研究型大学，是南加州大学在学术和体育领域的传统宿敌。
description.en: A public research university in Los Angeles, California, and a traditional rival of the University of Southern California in both academics and sports.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国印第安纳州的私立研究型大学，与南加州大学在美式足球领域有激烈的竞争关系。
description.en: A private research university in Indiana, United States, known for its intense football rivalry with the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州斯坦福的私立研究型大学，与南加州大学在体育赛事上是竞争对手。
description.en: A private research university in Stanford, California, and a sports rival of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 美国工程师、企业家，高通公司联合创始人。南加州大学维特比工程学院以其名字命名，以纪念其捐赠。
description.en: American engineer and businessman, co-founder of Qualcomm. USC's Viterbi School of Engineering is named in his honor following his donation.

zh-cn: Andrew and Erna Viterbi工程学院
en: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学的工程学院，以高通公司联合创始人Andrew Viterbi的名字命名。
description.en: The engineering school of the University of Southern California, named after Qualcomm co-founder Andrew Viterbi.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国半导体和电信设备公司。
description.en: An American multinational semiconductor and telecommunications equipment company.

description.zh-cn: 科进系统公司创始人，曾向南加州大学电机系进行巨额捐赠。
description.en: Founder of Cogent Inc., who made a substantial donation to the USC Department of Electrical Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 美国宇航员、试飞员，是第一位踏上月球的人类。南加州大学校友。
description.en: American astronaut and test pilot, and the first person to walk on the Moon. Alumnus of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治家，曾任第90、96、97、98任日本内阁总理大臣。南加州大学校友。
description.en: Japanese politician who served as the 90th, 96th, 97th, and 98th Prime Minister of Japan. Alumnus of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学第一任校长。
description.en: The first president of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 罗伯特·M·维德尼于1880年创立了南加州大学。
description.en: Robert M. Widney founded the University of Southern California in 1880.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学是域名系统的诞生地。
description.en: The University of Southern California is the birthplace of the Domain Name System.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·卢卡斯是南加州大学电影艺术学院的著名校友。
description.en: George Lucas is a famous alumnus of the USC School of Cinematic Arts.

relationships.target: 南加州大学电影艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 乔治·卢卡斯于2006年向南加州大学电影艺术学院捐赠了1.75亿美元。
description.en: George Lucas donated $175 million to the USC School of Cinematic Arts in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与上海交通大学合作，开设海外EMBA课程并共同成立了上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院。
description.en: The University of Southern California partnered with Shanghai Jiao Tong University to offer an overseas EMBA program and jointly establish the USC-SJTU Institute of Cultural and Creative Industry.

relationships.target: 上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与上海交通大学于2015年合作成立了上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院。
description.en: The University of Southern California and Shanghai Jiao Tong University jointly founded the USC-SJTU Institute of Cultural and Creative Industry in 2015.

relationships.target: 上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院

description.zh-cn: 上海交通大学与南加州大学于2015年合作成立了上海交大-南加州大学文化创意产业学院。
description.en: Shanghai Jiao Tong University and the University of Southern California jointly founded the USC-SJTU Institute of Cultural and Creative Industry in 2015.

relationships.target: 洛杉矶加利福尼亚大学

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与洛杉矶加利福尼亚大学（UCLA）在学术和体育领域是著名的宿敌。
description.en: The University of Southern California and the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) are well-known rivals in academics and sports.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与圣母大学在美式足球领域存在激烈的竞争关系。
description.en: The University of Southern California has an intense football rivalry with the University of Notre Dame.

description.zh-cn: 南加州大学与史丹佛大学在体育赛事上是竞争对手。
description.en: The University of Southern California is a sports rival of Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 卡萝尔·福尔特自2019年起担任南加州大学校长。
description.en: Carol Folt has served as the president of the University of Southern California since 2019.

description.zh-cn: Andrew Viterbi及其夫人向南加州大学工程学院捐赠5200万美元，该学院因此更名为维特比工程学院以纪念他们。
description.en: Andrew Viterbi and his wife donated $52 million to the USC School of Engineering, which was renamed the Viterbi School of Engineering in their honor.

description.zh-cn: Andrew Viterbi是高通公司的联合创始人。
description.en: Andrew Viterbi is a co-founder of Qualcomm.

description.zh-cn: 谢明于2006年向南加州大学电机系捐赠了3500万美元。
description.en: Ming Hsieh donated $35 million to the USC Department of Electrical Engineering in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 第一位踏上月球的人类尼尔·阿姆斯壮是南加州大学的校友。
description.en: Neil Armstrong, the first person to walk on the Moon, is an alumnus of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 前日本首相安倍晋三是南加州大学的校友。
description.en: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is an alumnus of the University of Southern California.

relationships.source: 南加州大学电影艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 电影艺术学院是南加州大学下属的专业学院之一。
description.en: The School of Cinematic Arts is one of the professional schools of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 维特比工程学院是南加州大学下属的专业学院之一。
description.en: The Viterbi School of Engineering is one of the professional schools of the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: Marion M. Bovard于1880年至1891年间担任南加州大学校长。
description.en: Marion M. Bovard served as the president of the University of Southern California from 1880 to 1891.
